means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 费里职业名称，渡船工，或地貌名称，来源于中世纪英语及古英语，含义是“渡口，渡船”(ferry)
[人名] [爱尔兰姓氏] 费里盖尔语姓氏的英语形式，来源于人名，含义是“人”(man)

word_mean: 航空器由现驻机场起飞转到另一机场降落的飞行过程。
往返于内河或海峡两岸或在湖泊、水库或岛屿间从事短途渡运旅客、货物、行李和车辆的船。

sentence.Network_en: The ferry service has restarted after an interval of 12 years.
sentence.Network_cn: 时隔12年之后，轮渡服务又重新开通了。

sentence.Network_en: She was going to Nanaimo to catch the ferry to the mainland.
sentence.Network_cn: 她准备去纳奈莫乘渡船回大陆。

sentence.Network_en: The ferry did not even have time to send out an SOS.
sentence.Network_cn: 渡船甚至连发出紧急呼救信号的时间都没有。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old Norse ferja 'ferry boat', of Germanic origin and related to fare

entry.def: A ferry is a boat that transports passengers and sometimes also vehicles, usually across rivers or short stretches of sea.

example.ex: They had recrossed the River Gambia by ferry.
example.tran: 他们乘渡船再次穿过冈比亚河。

entry.tran: (通常指定时往返两地间)运送，渡运，摆渡
entry.def: If a vehicle ferries people or goods, it transports them, usually by means of regular journeys between the same two places.

example.ex: Every day, a plane arrives to ferry guests to and from Bird Island Lodge...
example.tran: 每天，都有架飞机来鸟岛宾馆接送客人。

example.ex: It was still dark when five coaches started to ferry the miners the 140 miles from the Silverhill colliery...
example.tran: 天还黑着，就有5辆大巴开始从距银山煤矿 140 英里的地方出发运送矿工。

means.word_mean: 1. a boat that transports people or vehicles across a body of water and operates on a regular schedule
1. transport from one place to another

in不+different不同的→同与不同的"事不关已" →冷漠的

odori=odor气味+fer带来,拿来+ous……的→带来气味的

suffer[v.受苦]+able能……的→adj.可容忍的,可忍耐的
transfer[n.&v.转移;转换;转让;过户;迁移;改乘]+able能……的→adj.可转让的

coni松果+fer带来,拿来→带来松果的树→针叶树

defer推迟+ment表名词→n.推迟;延迟

fer带来,拿来+ry状态,性质→带来带去
fertile[adj.肥沃的,富饶的;能繁殖的]+ity表名词→n.肥沃,丰饶
fertilize[v.使受精;施肥于,使肥沃]+er表名词→n.[fertiliser]肥料
of一再+fer带来,拿来→一再带来→提供
offer[v.提供,提议,出现 n.出价,提议,意图]+ing表名词→n.报盘,提供的货物
prefer[v.[to]更喜欢,宁愿]+ence表名词→n.[for,to]偏爱,喜爱;优惠;优先选择

refer[v.参考,查询;提到,引用,涉及;提交,上呈]+ee人→被双方提及的人→裁判

sentences.en: You can cross the river by ferry.
We waited at the ferry for two hours.
sentences.cn: 我们在渡口等了两个小时。

sentences.en: The airplanes are ferrying motorcars between England and France.
sentences.cn: 飞机在英法之间运送汽车。

jushi.english: You can cross the river by ferry.
We waited at the ferry for twenty minutes.
